Ancestry-Insectoid -- Male Insectoid Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Amorous: -2 on Tests vs. Attractive character
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 3 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Fey Blood Hindrances: Amorous; Mean; Pacifist Insectoid Features: Additional Actions; Armor +2; Bite Or Claw; Hive Minded; Outsider; Unusual Body Shape; Wall Walker
Feature Notes:
Hive Minded: Has Driven+ and Loyal features wrt colony
Driven+: Has overwhelming need to fulfill personal goal
Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Unusual Body Shape: Cannot use standard armor or furnishings
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (3) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Bite (d6+d4); Claws (d6+d4); Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor+2: +2 Armor
Bite Or Claw: Mandibles or pincers inflict Bite or Claws damage
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Additional Actions: Use of limbs reduces multi-action penalty by 2
Fey Blood: May make free reroll to resist enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Wall Walker: May move full Pace on vertical surfaces, half Pace on inverted
Notes
Validation Errors: Improvement Allocation: 3 available vs. 4 allocated
